replies.author: North丶Kraken
replies.txt_content:
只装了PlaceholderAPI没有装记分板要求的对应变量把。
papi ecloud download player
papi ecloud download server
papi ecloud download vault

replies.txt_content: 计分板显示文字过长  请重新配置计分板文字长度  你写了29位最大16位
